title.native: 歴史に残る悪女になるぞ
title.romaji: Rekishi ni Nokoru Akujo ni Naruzo
title.english: I’ll Become a Villainess Who Goes Down in History

description:
Me, the same girl who hates all those prim and proper heroines, got reincarnated as the villain in the world of my favorite fantasy dating sim! It’s my dream come true, so I’m going to leave my mark on history by becoming the world’s greatest villain! But to do that, I’ll need to get a lot stronger, and smarter. Just one problem—the harder I try to be evil, the harder the prince falls for me! At this rate, will I ever get to earn my place in history!?

(Source: Yen Press)

Note: The first episode was exclusively shown as a world premiere during the Anime Messe Babelsberg 2024 on July 20th 2024 as a part of a special Anime Panel.
hashtag: #歴史に残る悪女になるぞ #歴悪
synonyms: I'll Become a Villainess That Will Go Down in History
I'll Become a Villainess That Will Go Down in History - The More of a Villainess I Become, the More the Prince Will Dote on Me
Rekishi ni Nokoru Akujo ni Naruzo: Akuyaku Reijou ni Naru hodo Ouji no Dekiai wa Kasoku Suru you desu!
歴史に残る悪女になるぞ　悪役令嬢になるほど王子の溺愛は加速するようです！

tags.name: Villainess
tags.description: Centers around or prominently features a villainous noble lady.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Reincarnation
tags.description: Features a character being born again after death, typically as another person or in another world.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Time Skip
tags.description: Features a gap in time used to advance the story.

tags.name: Politics
tags.description: Centers around politics, politicians, or government activities.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Kingdom Management
tags.description: Characters in these series take on the responsibility of running a town or kingdom, whether they take control of an existing one, or build their own from the ground up.

tags.name: Love Triangle
tags.description: Centered around romantic feelings between more than two people. Includes all love polygons.

tags.name: Class Struggle
tags.description: Contains conflict born between the different social classes. Generally between an dominant elite and a suffering oppressed group.

tags.name: Primarily Male Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of male characters.

tags.name: Swordplay
tags.description: Prominently features the use of swords in combat.

tags.name: Age Gap
tags.description: Prominently features romantic relations between people with a significant age difference.

node.description:
__Graduated:__ Kunitachi College of Music (Department of Composition)

__[Profile (Miracle Bus Corp.)](http://miraclebus.com/composer/moehyuga)__

__Introduction:__
Moe Hyuuga is a Japanese composer and arranger, who is affiiliated with the Miracle Bus Corporation. 

__Biography:__
She started learning the piano as early as the age of two. Moe also aspired to be a composer, while being able to play music at an early age. In her current state of affairs, she mainly composes and arranges visual type music such as commercials, dramas and animation.

__Agency:__ StarRise

**[Website](https://kurusurin.jp/) | [Profile (Lantis)](https://lantis.jp/artist/kurusurin/) | [Profile (StarRise)](https://starrise.info/artists/kurusurin/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kurusurindesu) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ringring_rin/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@kurusu_rin)**

Japanese singer and voice actor, and former member/center of the idol group *26-Ji no Masquerade (26時のマスカレイド)*.
ADR Engineer at FUNimation Entertainment, however has since expanded to also being a Mixing Engineer.
Samantha Herek is a producer and actress.

[LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/derric-benavides-3187119a/)

Affiliated with [Funimation](https://anilist.co/studio/102) as an ADR Engineer.
